testCase.name: 2/tweets/counts/recent endpoint Positive Test It should return 200 as status code when the request is correct
2/tweets/counts/recent endpoint Positive Test It should return an object containing a property data which should be an array
2/tweets/counts/recent endpoint Positive Test Each entry of data should contain a end date, start date and tweet_count property
2/tweets/counts/recent endpoint Negative Test It should return 500 as status code when the request is made incorrectly
statuses/user_timeline endpoint Positive Test It should return 200 as status code when the request is correct
statuses/user_timeline endpoint Positive Test It should return an array
statuses/user_timeline endpoint Positive Test Each object should be a tweet information, containing various property such as text, id, created_at
statuses/user_timeline endpoint Positive Test Each tweet must be created by the user of the query
statuses/user_timeline endpoint Negative Test It should return 500 as status code when the request is made incorrectly
/search/tweets endpoint Positive Test It should return 200 as status code when the request is correct
/search/tweets endpoint Positive Test It should return an object
/search/tweets endpoint Positive Test The object return should contain a statuses property containing each tweet information
/search/tweets endpoint Positive Test Each tweet must contain a text and id property
/search/tweets endpoint Positive Test Each tweet must either contain the query or be cut
/search/tweets endpoint Negative test It should return 500 as status code when the request is made incorrectly
/geo/id/ endpoint Positive Test It should return 200 when the request is made correctly
/geo/id/ endpoint Positive Test It should return an object
/geo/id/ endpoint Positive Test The object should contain information about the place such as a name, a country, an id
/geo/id/ endpoint Positive Test The id returned must match the geoID passed as query
/geo/id/ endpoint Negative Test It should return 404 as status code when the id of the geo is not valid
2/user/ endpoint Positive Test It should return 200 as status code when the request is correct
2/user/ endpoint Positive Test It should return an object containing a info abou the user
2/user/ endpoint Positive Test It should return the data about the user of the query
2/user/ endpoint Negative Test It should return 500 as status code when the user is is not valid
/termcloud endpoint Positive test It should return a status code of 200 if the request is made correctly
/termcloud endpoint Positive test It should return an non-empty array
/termcloud endpoint Positive test It should return an array of object each containing word and freq
/termcloud endpoint Positive test Each freq property should have a positive value
/termcloud endpoint Positive test Each word must not be empty
/termcloud endpoint Negative test It should return a status code of 500 if no query is inserted in the request
2/tweets/search/all endpoint Positive Test It should return 200 as status code when the request is correct
2/tweets/search/all endpoint Positive Test It should return an object
2/tweets/search/all endpoint Positive Test The object return should contain a data property containing each tweet information
2/tweets/search/all endpoint Positive Test Each tweet must contain a text and id property
2/tweets/search/all endpoint Positive Test Each tweet must either contain the query or be cut
2/tweets/search/all endpoint Negative test It should return 500 as status code when the request is not correct
/sentiment endpoint Positive test It should return a status code of 200 if the request is made correctly
/sentiment endpoint Positive test It should return an object containing various property
/sentiment endpoint Positive test Each count (positive, negative, neutral) should be a positive integer
/sentiment endpoint Positive test Best and worst property should contain a tweet information and score information
/sentiment endpoint Negative Test It should return 500 as status code when the request is made incorrectly
